name: Overchrome
description:
The Theme is Depths with the Limitation as Health is a Tool.

So for the Theme, Mike (our guy) has to get to the elevator which leads underground.

As for the Limitation, Mike can use one of our heart as a bullet
to interact with objects or transfer a heart to a Robot to gain control of it.

CONTROLS:

KEYSACTIONSACTORSW, A, DMove and JumpMike, RobotSEnter DoorMikeDeactivateRobotMouseAimMikeLeft Mouse ClickShoot/Transfer HeartMike

CREDITS:

Co-Level Designed by Blob#0684 (He sucks at wall jumping)

Assets from Grafxkid, ExceptRea, and ComixTrash

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org

Tips for Dummies:
Oneside Wall Jump = Jump then Press D (Left) if the wall is on the right, and vice versa.
Fast Oneside Wall Jump = If the wall is on the right, Hold Jump and A (Right) and then spam click D (Left)
